name: What's Updog?
description:
Our hero Pup wakes up one day overhearing their human talking about Updog. What is Updog? Is it food? Is it a place? Pup has to know! Set out on a journey around town and find out the answer to this very mysterious question.

What's Updog? is a point and click adventure with 2D overworld exploration made for the original Game Boy! This was made as a personal game jam over the course of 6 weeks and is my first completed game!

Features:

  • Short! Maybe 15-20 minutes.
  • Game Boy ROM. Tested and working on a REAL Game Boy.
  • Puns.
  • Hand drawn art.
  • Dedicated bark button.
  • Game Boy Color palettes.
  • Super Game Boy border.

Controls

  • D-Pad - Directional movement
  • B - Bark (On overworld)
  • A - Interact
  • Start - Inventory/pause

This game is SHORT!!!

Art and Programming: Derek Boyko (Boyks)

Music: Beatscribe

Made in GB Studio

Edit: Added a .pocket file for sideloading onto an Analogue Pocket.
